reviews.Subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair exams. Could improve on office hours availability.

reviews.Subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.Subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes moves too fast through difficult concepts.

reviews.Subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and helpful problem-solving strategies.

reviews.Subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher. Encourages critical thinking and class participation.

reviews.Subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and assignments are unclear. Needs improvement.

reviews.Subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Well-organized lab sessions and comprehensive lecture notes.

reviews.Subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions. Challenges students in the best way possible.

reviews.Subject: Physics
reviews.review: Brilliant mind but struggles to explain complex concepts to beginners.

reviews.Subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about books. Assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.Subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Brings real-world examples into class. Highly relevant and interesting.

reviews.Subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Often goes off-topic. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.Subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about sustainability. Field trips are a great learning experience.

reviews.Subject: Art History
reviews.review: Encyclopedic knowledge of art. Makes every lecture fascinating.

reviews.Subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research shared in class, but expectations can be unclear.

reviews.Subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Balanced viewpoints on complex global issues. Encourages debate.

reviews.Subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Excellent at simplifying complex concepts. Always available for help.

reviews.Subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knows the subject well but is often unprepared for class.

reviews.Subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Could improve on providing feedback.

reviews.Subject: Business Ethics
reviews.review: Interesting case studies but lectures can be monotonous.
